parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the dedicated cluster. You can view the dedicated cluster ID on the Dedicated Clusters page in the ApsaraDB for MyBase console.

> Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: DedicatedHostName
parameters.description:
The ID of the host in the dedicated cluster. You can call the [DescribeDedicatedHosts](~~200944~~) operation to query the host ID.

> Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: The database engine of the instance. Set the value to **Redis**.

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description: The database engine version of the instance. Set the value to **5.0**.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

> The instance must be created by using a dedicated cluster. For more information, see [What is ApsaraDB for MyBase?](~~141455~~)

parameters.name: InstanceNetType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Valid values:

*   **0**: Internet
*   **1**: classic network
*   **2**: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)

parameters.name: InstanceStatus
parameters.description:
The state of the instance. Valid values:

*   **0**: The instance is being created.
*   **1**: The instance is running.
*   **3**: The instance is being deleted.
*   **5**: The configurations of the instance are being changed.
*   **6**: The instance is being migrated.
*   **7**: The instance is being restored from a backup.
*   **8**: A master-replica switchover is in progress.
*   **9**: Expired data of the instance is being deleted.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**. Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61012~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeZones](~~94527~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
